languages.text: "Сначала предательство Кунрада... теперь вот эта заварушка... старик, а как мы с тобой еще живы, а?"
"First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How are you and I still alive, old man?"
languages.original_text: "Сначала предательство Кунрада... теперь вот эта заварушка... старик, а как мы с тобой еще живы, а?"

traits.locale_text: "First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How the hell are you and I still alive, old man?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How the hell are you and I still alive, old man?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How the hell are you and I still alive, old man?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How are you and I still alive, old man?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “先是昆拉德背叛，紧接着又发生了这样的破事……咱们到底是怎么活下来的，老家伙？”
languages.original_text: "First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How are you and I still alive, old man?"

traits.locale_text: “先是昆拉德背叛了，紧接着又发生了这样的破事……咱们到底是怎么活下来的，老家伙？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « D'abord la trahison de Kunrad, et maintenant, ça... C'est à se demander comment on a réussi à survivre tous les deux. »
languages.original_text: "First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How are you and I still alive, old man?"

traits.locale_text: « D'abord la trahison de Kunrad, et maintenant, ça... C'est à se demander comment on a réussi à survivre tous les deux. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Primero la traición de Kunrad y ahora este lío... ¿Cómo seguimos vivos, anciano?».
languages.original_text: "First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How are you and I still alive, old man?"

traits.locale_text: «Primero la traición de Kunrad y ahora este lío... ¿Cómo seguimos vivos, anciano?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「クンラッドの裏切りから、こんな騒ぎになるなんて…あなたも私も、どうしてまだ生きてられるのかしら、おじいさん」
languages.original_text: "First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How are you and I still alive, old man?"

traits.locale_text: 「クンラッドの裏切りから、こんな騒ぎになるなんて…一体あなたも私もどうしてまだ生きてられるのかしら、おじいさん」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Erst Kunrads Verrat, jetzt dieser Irrsinn ... Wie kann es sein, dass wir beide noch leben, alter Mann?"
languages.original_text: "First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How are you and I still alive, old man?"

traits.locale_text: "Erst Kunrads Verrat, jetzt dieser Irrsinn ... Wie kann es sein, dass wir beide noch leben, alter Mann?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How the hell are you and I still alive, old man?"

languages.text: "Önce Kunrad'ın ihaneti, şimdi de bu saçmalık... Nasıl hâlâ hayattayız ihtiyar?"
languages.original_text: "First Kunrad's betrayal, now this mess... How are you and I still alive, old man?"

traits.locale_text: "Önce Kunrad'ın ihaneti, şimdi de bu saçmalık... Biz nasıl hâlâ yaşıyoruz ihtiyar?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
